MAST_S1_L3_centre_radial_1.description: Outward radial path down centre of louvre 3 in sector 1, spanning tiles 2-3?, in the lower divertor

MAST_S1_L3_centre_radial_2.description: Outward radial path along lower divertor on louvre 3 in sector 1, spanning tiles 2-3?

MAST_louvre3-8b.description: First line defining area used in IDL sched code path for pulse 23586. Extracted from ldef/theo variable.

MAST_louvre3-8b-2.description: Seccond line defining area used in IDL sched code path for pulse 23586. Extracted from ldef/theo variable.

MAST_louvre12d.description: Line used in IDL sched code path for pulse 26505. Extracted from ldef/theo variable.

MAST_louvre12d_rotated.description: Line used in IDL sched code path for pulse 26505. Rotated in phi so that projected pixel coords aprox match those from IDL code
